# scrollPageDown(_:)

**Instance Method**

Scrolls the content down by a page.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func scrollPageDown(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Scrolling Content

- **scrollPageUp(_:)**: Scrolls the content up by a page.
- **scrollLineDown(_:)**: Scrolls the content down by a line.
- **scrollLineUp(_:)**: Scrolls the content up by a line.
- **scrollToBeginningOfDocument(_:)**: Scrolls the content to the beginning of the document.
- **scrollToEndOfDocument(_:)**: Scrolls the content to the end of the document.
- **pageDown(_:)**: Moves the visible content region down by a page.
- **pageUp(_:)**: Moves the visible content region up by a page.
- **pageDownAndModifySelection(_:)**: Moves the visible content region down by a page, and extends the current selection.
- **pageUpAndModifySelection(_:)**: Moves the visible content region up by a page, and extends the current selection.
- **centerSelectionInVisibleArea(_:)**: Moves the visible content region so the current selection is visually centered.
